Welcome to Retainful

Hi {{customer.name}},

This is to confirm that your account is now active. Next time you shop with us, log in for faster checkout.

Visit our store

Many thanks,
Team Retainful

Your discount coupon

As a way of saying thanks for shopping with us, here is a discount code for 10% off your next purchase within the next two weeks.

{{ retainful_coupon }}
SHOP NOW!

@ Retainful | {{shop.address}}

If you have any quetions please contact us {{shop.email}} | {{shop.phone}}
